channel.description: Recent content in dimensional reduction on

item.title: Three Commonn Ways for comparing Two Dataset Distributions
item.description: From time to time you will need to compare the distribution of two datasets. There are plenty of information about this topic in statistics books and all over the Internet. In this post I discuss three very practical approaches coming from different perspectives. [3.5 min read]

item.title: Tools of the Week.
item.description: UMAP, SHAP Values among other links to interesting stuff I run into.
